languages.text: Настоятель Гектархиус же поведал: "Обитель наша чиста и уединена, не знаем мы мирских тщет и знати не хотим. Чада сии хотят ее имати. Убереги нас от напасти сей, ибо люди сии злы, несметны и несут за собой дурной рок".

Quoth Prelate Hectarchius, "Ours is a pure and secluded abode; by worldly futility we are untouched and so we wish to remain. These unknowing souls seek to capture our abode. Avert this calamity of ours, for they are a people malicious, and multitudinous, and misfated."
languages.original_text: Настоятель Гектархиус же поведал: "Обитель наша чиста и уединена, не знаем мы мирских тщет и знати не хотим. Чада сии хотят ее имати. Убереги нас от напасти сей, ибо люди сии злы, несметны и несут за собой дурной рок".

Quoth Prelate Hectarchius, "Ours is a pure and secluded abode; by worldly futility we are untouched and so we wish to remain. These unknowing souls seek to capture our abode. Avert this calamity of ours, for they are a people malicious, and multitudinous, and misfated."

languages.text: Y dijo el prelado Hectarchius: «La nuestra es una morada pura y aislada. La futilidad de lo mundano no nos concierne, y rogamos por que siga siendo así. Estas almas inconscientes buscan capturar nuestro hogar. Detened esta calamidad, pues son gente malvada, numerosa y de destino infausto».
languages.original_text: Quoth Prelate Hectarchius, "Ours is a pure and secluded abode; by worldly futility we are untouched and so we wish to remain. These unknowing souls seek to capture our abode. Avert this calamity of ours, for they are a people malicious, and multitudinous, and misfated."

traits.locale_text: Y dijo el prelado Hectarchius: «La nuestra es una morada pura y aislada. La futilidad de lo mundano no nos concierne, y rogamos por que siga siendo así. Estas almas inconscientes buscan capturar nuestro hogar. Detened esta calamidad, pues son gente malvada, numerosa y de destino infausto».

languages.text: 赫克塔奇乌斯教长说道：“我们的修道院是个纯洁而隐秘的居所。我们从未受世俗的徒劳所累，我们也希望继续保持现状。这些无知的人们打算占领我们的居所。请阻止这场灾难吧，这些心怀恶意的人为数众多，而且确实命运多舛。”
languages.original_text: Quoth Prelate Hectarchius, "Ours is a pure and secluded abode; by worldly futility we are untouched and so we wish to remain. These unknowing souls seek to capture our abode. Avert this calamity of ours, for they are a people malicious, and multitudinous, and misfated."

traits.locale_text: 赫克塔奇乌斯教长说道：“我们的修道院是个纯洁而隐秘的居所。我们从未受世俗的徒劳所累，我们也希望继续保持现状。这些无知的人们打算占领我们的居所。请阻止这场灾难吧，这些心怀恶意的人为数众多，而且确实命运多舛。”

languages.text: 上級聖職者ヘクターキウスは言った。「我々の住処は、世間と交わらぬ地であり、世俗的かつ無駄なものとは触れざる場所だ。故に、我々はここに残ることを望む。この無知なる魂達は、我々の住処を奪おうとしている。この者達は悪意を持ち、数も多く、不運だ。この災いを回避するのだ」
languages.original_text: Quoth Prelate Hectarchius, "Ours is a pure and secluded abode; by worldly futility we are untouched and so we wish to remain. These unknowing souls seek to capture our abode. Avert this calamity of ours, for they are a people malicious, and multitudinous, and misfated."

traits.locale_text: 上級聖職者ヘクターキウスは言った。「我々の住処は、世間と交わらぬ地であり、世俗的かつ無駄なものとは触れざる場所だ。故に、我々はここに残ることを望む。この無知なる魂達は、我々の住処を奪おうとしている。この者達は悪意を持ち、数も多く、不運だ。この災いを回避するのだ」

languages.text: Prälat Hectarchius sprach: "Unsere Heimstatt ist rein und abgeschieden, unberührt von weltlicher Sinnlosigkeit, und so soll es auch bleiben. Diese unwissenden Seelen wollen unsere Heimstatt erobern. Wendet diese Katastrophe von uns ab, denn diese Menschen sind bösartig, zahlreich und fehlgeleitet."
languages.original_text: Quoth Prelate Hectarchius, "Ours is a pure and secluded abode; by worldly futility we are untouched and so we wish to remain. These unknowing souls seek to capture our abode. Avert this calamity of ours, for they are a people malicious, and multitudinous, and misfated."

traits.locale_text: Prälat Hectarchius sprach: "Unsere Heimstatt ist rein und abgeschieden, unberührt von weltlicher Sinnlosigkeit, und so soll es auch bleiben. Diese unwissenden Seelen wollen unsere Heimstatt erobern. Wendet diese Katastrophe von uns ab, denn diese Menschen sind bösartig, zahlreich und fehlgeleitet."

languages.text: Le prélat Hectarchius dit : « Notre demeure est pure et isolée, nous sommes épargnés par la futilité du monde et souhaitons que cela continue. Ces âmes incultes cherchent à s'emparer de notre monastère. Chassez cette calamité, car cette horde innombrable d'individus malveillants nous accable. »
languages.original_text: Quoth Prelate Hectarchius, "Ours is a pure and secluded abode; by worldly futility we are untouched and so we wish to remain. These unknowing souls seek to capture our abode. Avert this calamity of ours, for they are a people malicious, and multitudinous, and misfated."

traits.locale_text: Le prélat Hectarchius dit : « Notre demeure est pure et isolée, nous sommes épargnés par la futilité du monde et souhaitons que cela continue. Ces âmes incultes cherchent à s'emparer de notre monastère. Chassez cette calamité, car cette horde innombrable d'individus malveillants nous accable. »

languages.text: Dedi ki Piskopos Hectarchius: "Yuvamız saf ve tecrit edilmiştir; boş, dünyevi uğraşlar oraya uğramamıştır. Bu şekilde kalmak istiyoruz. Bu bihaber ruhlar yuvamızı ele geçirmek istiyor. Bizi bu felaketten azat edin. Bu insanlar kötü niyetli, çok kalabalık ve kaderleri mühürlü."
languages.original_text: Quoth Prelate Hectarchius, "Ours is a pure and secluded abode; by worldly futility we are untouched and so we wish to remain. These unknowing souls seek to capture our abode. Avert this calamity of ours, for they are a people malicious, and multitudinous, and misfated."

traits.locale_text: Dedi ki Psikopos Hectarchius: "Yuvamız saf ve tecrit edilmiştir; boş, dünyevi uğraşlar oraya uğramamıştır. Bu şekilde kalmak istiyoruz. Bu bihaber ruhlar yuvamızı ele geçirmek istiyor. Bizi bu felaketten azat edin. Bu insanlar kötü niyetli, çok kalabalık ve kaderleri mühürlü."
